title: Darkstar Alliance: A League community for AUS/NZ or any OCE players

embed.description: For Australia and NZ MWO, Star Citizen and other gaming, come visit the Darkstar Alliance

body:
Just looking to get our clan out there in the league community

Darkstar Alliance is a AUS/NZ casual gaming guild with Teamspeak3 and forums.
Whilst our core focus is on OCE, our player base is worldwide.

We have a mature and relaxed atmosphere. Our members play a broad range of games.
DSA was founded back in 1999 so we're well established and we're here to stay.

If you would like to join
1. Visit our website and register via the recruitment tab - http://darkstar-alliance.com/recruitment. 
2. If you haven't already, download Teamspeak3 - https://www.teamspeak.com/downloads. 
3. Bookmark DSA in TeamSpeak3, there is a link on the right hand side, mid way down on the DSA home page.
4. Get your permissions setup on TeamSpeak3 by jumping on and introducing yourself or posting on the forums.

If you would like to visit before deciding to sign up
1. Just jump on to TeamSpeak3, link is on the DSA home page.

Visitors are always welcome to come along and kick some butt.
No matter what you're into, casual or hardcore, come check us out!

Looking forward to seeing you on the DarkStar Alliance squad!
-Derpy Turtle
